namespace_definition.note: The namespace is the publisher or vendor of the extension (e.g., 'redhat', 'microsoft'). This corresponds to the 'Publisher' property of the 'Identity' element in the package's .vsixmanifest file.

name_definition.note: The extension name. This corresponds to the 'Id' property of the 'Identity' element in the package's .vsixmanifest file.

version_definition.note: The extension version. This corresponds to the 'Version' property of the 'Identity' element in the package's .vsixmanifest file.

qualifiers_definition.description: The target platform for the extension. Common values include 'universal', 'linux-x64', 'linux-arm64', 'darwin-x64', 'darwin-arm64', 'win32-x64', 'win32-arm64', etc.
